mapper.select: SELECT m.MNO as mno, m.NICKNAME as nickname, m.WEIGHT as weight, m.HEIGHT as height, m.GOAL_WEIGHT as goalWeight, bw.BWAGE_GROUP as ageGroup, -- BWAGE_GROUP 컬럼을 직접 선택 bw.BWCREATED_AT as participationTime FROM MEMBER m JOIN BOARDWEEKLY bw ON m.MNO = bw.MNO WHERE bw.BWCREATED_AT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARDWEEKLY WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND BWCREATED_AT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARDWEEKLY (BWNO, MNO, BWAGE_GROUP, BWCREATED_AT) VALUES ( BOARDWEEKLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mno}, #{bwage_group}, SYSDATE )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARDWEEKLY WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND BWCREATED_AT >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')
